title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes does not use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
OB: When updating the checkbox state of the table, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) for the changes to be reflected. No busy cursor is shown during this process.
EB: When updating the checkbox state of the table, it should be done more efficiently and quickly. A busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the operation is in progress.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Select multiple checkboxes in the table.
3. Observe the time it takes for the checkboxes to update. Note that no busy cursor is shown during this process.
